mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from tb1_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
mapper.insert: insert into tb1_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tb1_reply set reply=#{reply}, updatedate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
